title: Newinvestorfromlegit
author: Newinvestorfromlegit
content: Hello, i am asking (help)I have some knowledge,after weeks and month of search !i don't found a good investment platform ..i need a platform for low investments i also tried binance bnb vault but its poor.i know there are too pancakeswap it's good but i dont have sufficiant funds to make more than 5$ to 10$ a day.. ='( !!! i need help Need investments website/app Legit (Low balance) also need to make funds for..Thank .

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: You want an "investment" with potentially high yields, go start a small business.If you see an investment opportunity in the crypto space with high yields, it's either a scam, or very risky.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: mk4 on September 03, 2022, 03:48:04 AMIf you see an investment opportunity in the crypto space with high yields, it's either a scam, or very risky.Either staking, the altcoins which may not become profitable, or like the yobit shit coins and the likes which have high yield percentage like X10 and X100 in the past that investors would only found themselves losing after all. Or like the well designed ponzi scheme or hyip platforms in which the late investors will all lose. All high yield profitable investment is likely a scam or a means to lose money, only the low yield ones are the real investment.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: In staking, you need to think about how much the returns are. The legitimate ones are gonna give you around 10%-15% as the maximum APY. But if you're looking to have more than that, you're taking that much risk.Aside from that, the lower capital you have and you're thinking of $5-$10 per day, it isn't a simple thing to make because it will require you more capital to achieve that per day profit.
